english: Are you so afraid, Cardinal, that Jesus will protect us?

text: Hem sizin gibi aptallarla yeterince meşgul olduğu belli
english: He's obviously busy enough with idiots like you.

text: Siz bilirsiniz. Madem bu kadar çok gitmek istiyorsunuz
english: It's up to you, if you want to go so badly.

text: Efendim, Ertuğrul kaleye doğru geliyor yanında üç Alpiyle
english: Sir, Ertugrul is on his way to the castle with three Alps.
Send the knights to the sealed hole immediately.
The Turks may try to sneak in from there.
Yes, sir.
It turns out that a Turk is worth all of you.
They're a bunch of idiots.
What do you want, Turk?

text: Haçlı Kontluğu'na gönderdiğin mektubu sana geri getirdim
english: I brought you back the letter you sent to the Crusade.
You won't get out of here, Titus. There's no escape.

text: O kalenin duvarları mezar taşlarınız olacak
english: The walls of that castle will be your gravestones.

text: Bu da benim sana hediyem olsun Türk
english: Let this be my gift to you, Turk.
You can bury your first carcass.
Then I'll put you all in the ground in order.

text: Al şu sapkın döneğini de geldiğin cehenneme geri git
english: Go back to hell where you came from.
I swear I'll kill you, Titus.
I won't let you die with your death.
That's what your brother Dündar said.
You know what's going on, Ertugrul.
Dündar has recovered, you bastard.

text: Sizler, küçücük bir çocuğu öldürmeye tenezzül edecek kadar şerefsiz
english: You guys are assholes who would stoop to killing a little boy.
You're too weak to do it.
I will repay you with the like of what you used to do.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'e haber verin Kale hazır
english: Tell Mr. Ertugrul the castle is ready.
Incoming.
Remove the bodies.

text: Sorun çıkarsa öldürün. Daha gidecek çok yolumuz var
english: If there's trouble, kill him, we've got a long way to go.
And I can't deal with this kid.
Ya Bismillah
Allah!
Oh, my God, Bismillah!
Hak!

text: Böyle giderse karargâha zamanında yetişemeyeceğiz beyim
english: At this rate, we won't make it to headquarters in time, sir.

text: Yolun bundan sonrası eğimli Araba daha hızlı gider
english: The road from here on out goes faster than the curved car.

text: Alpleri aç, susuz, mühimmatsız bırakmayız evelallah
english: We will not leave the Alps hungry, thirsty, without ammunition.

text: Bu, Şehzade Yiğit'in kemeri değil mi beyim?
english: Isn't that Prince Hero's belt, sir?
Are you sure?
I'm sure, sir.

text: Sanki bilerek bize bir iz bırakmış
english: It's like he left us a trail on purpose.

text: Şehzade kalede hapis değil miydi beyim?
english: Wasn't the prince imprisoned in the castle, sir?
Someone might want to kidnap the prince.

text: Bu izler taze. Beş ya da altı kişiler
english: These marks are fresh, there are five or six of them.
They went this way.

text: Arabaya söyle, Süleyman Şah'ın karargâhına gitsin. Biz de iz sürelim. Hadi
english: Tell the car to go to Süleyman Shah's headquarters and we'll track him down.
Thank you, sir.

text: Siz Süleyman Şah'ın karargâhına devam edin haydi
english: You go on to the king's headquarters.

text: Bir yere mi kaçıyordun Kardinal Thomas ha?
english: Running somewhere, Cardinal Thomas?
It's fate to meet.
He drank the sherbet of martyrdom.

text: Allah'ın şanı büyüktür. Hayat denilen bu imtihandan alnının akıyla çıktı
english: Allah's glory is great, and he came out of this trial, called life.

text: Ömrünün son günlerinde hak yoluna girerek bu uğurda şehit oldu
english: In the last days of his life, he was a martyr for the right.
That's why we're not gonna count him as a dead man.
In the sight of God, he is one of the living.
Amen.
We gave our first martyr.
Let's hope he's our last martyr.
Inshallah.
Crazy Iron is coming.
What's up, Crazy Iron?

text: Pek hayır değil beyim. Dehlizleri bulduğumuzu öğrenmiş şerefsizler
english: Not really, sir, the bastards found out we found the pits.
They tore it down and turned it off again.
You see, there's no way we can get through there.

text: O kaleye girmenin bir yolu olmalı İkinci dehlizi bulmalıyız
english: There's got to be a way to get into that castle. We have to find the second perimeter.
There's a way

text: O kaleye girmenin ikinci bir yolu olmalı
english: There must be a second way into that castle.
Son, ambition for action
It is God who grants victory.
If a conquest is in place
No one can stop it.
There's a way into the castle.
Brother
Hero Ertuğrul Abi
That's my boy.

text: Ne haber aslanım? Nasıl çıktın kaleden?
english: How'd you get out of the castle?
My prince
It was dawn, how did this happen?

text: Kardinal beyim, kardinal. Şehzade Yiğit'i kaçırmaya çalışırken yakaladık
english: Your Eminence, Cardinal, we caught Prince Hero trying to kidnap him.
Where's the jinx?

text: Merak etme kardeşim. Mühimmat getiren Alplere emanet. Onlarla birlikte gelecek
english: Don't worry, brother, the Alps who brought the ammunition will come with them.

text: Velhasıl, şehzadenin size vereceği bir havadis var
english: After all, there's news the prince will give you.
My prince
I know where the second hole is.

text: Kardinal Thomas beni oradan kaçırmaya çalıştı
english: Cardinal Thomas tried to get me out of there.
Brother
You're such a big boy.
Omar
You didn't die in vain, my lion.
You didn't die in vain.
This is it.
The Alps they killed were Isodora's, her father's.

text: Turgut abime yaptıklarının, babama yaptıklarının intikamını alın Ertuğrul abi
english: Take revenge for what he did to my brother, for what he did to my father, for what he did to my brother, Ertugrul.
May God help you.

text: Senin gibi yiğitlerimiz olduğu sürece sırtımız asla yere gelmez evelallah
english: As long as we have brave men like you, our backs will never come to the ground.
Come on, braves of the Darşat!
Let's show these bastards the power of Kai

text: Selamünaleyküm. Selamünaleyküm Çıkasınız, çıkasınız. Gel, gel
english: Salam alaikum.
Come out, come out, come out.

text: Allah'ım şükürler olsun sana Allah razı olsun
english: Thank God for you.

text: Alın bunları dışarı Dışarı, dışarı, dışarı
english: Get them out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out, out!
God bless you, young man.
Thank you, go, go, go, go.
Get them out of here.

text: Antakya Haçlı Kontluğu'na yeni haberciler göndereceğim
english: I'll send new messengers to the Earl of Antioch
What if you don't make it?

text: İkinci dehlizden kaçmanız için elimden geleni yapacağım Üstad Ricardo
english: I'll do my best to get you out of our second danger, Master Ricardo.
The apricots have entered the castle, sir.

text: Nasıl? Nasıl mümkün olabilir böyle bir şey?
english: How is that possible?
They've found the second danger.
Cardinal Thomas, I shouldn't have sent you away.
Fucking coward.
Allahu Akbar
Allah, He is the Truth!
Allahu akbar!
Allahu Akbar!
Allahu Akbar!
Allahu Akbar!
Allahu Akbar!

text: Allahu ekber! Allahu ekber! Allahu ekber!
english: Allahu akbar Allahu akbar Allahu akbar Allahu akbar

text: Allahu ekber! Allahu ekber! Allahu ekber!
english: Allahu akbar Allahu akbar Allahu akbar Allahu akbar

english: Allahu akbar Allahu akbar Allahu akbar Allahu akbar

english: Allahu akbar Allahu akbar Allahu akbar Allahu akbar

text: Allahu ekber! Allahu ekber! Allahu ekber!
english: Allahu akbar Allahu akbar Allahu akbar Allahu akbar

english: Allahu akbar Allahu akbar Allahu akbar Allahu akbar
